GET http://localhost:3000/editor?token=THE-TOKEN&memeId=SOME-ID

bzw. als Query Param angeben:   token  - THE-TOKEN
                                memeId - SOME-ID

Login required

JSON-Body:
{
    "start":0,
    "end":5
}

Gives back a class with an image as ".wanted" and all the templates as ".templates" the
templates from the list of templates specified in start and end
